summary: Implements the requested admin-only deployment/build verification panel, updates BUILD_VERSION, and extends the deploy/publish guidance with English-only cache-busting instructions and a reload button. One minor spec gap: the admin panel does not appear to surface a distinct “canister host” identifier beyond hostname/network detection.

missing_requirements.requirement: Display detected network/canister host information if available (in addition to basic runtime info).
missing_requirements.reason: The new admin panel shows Hostname and a coarse Network label (IC vs Local), but there is no clear canister host/id detection or display beyond window.location.hostname.
